meta.description: Determine the optimal total cost for LogiChain to open distribution centers and transport goods to satisfy the demand of all eight retail stores, considering both opening and transportation costs.

sets.name: STORES
sets.description: Retail stores that need to be supplied.

params.name: opening_cost
params.description: Opening costs for each distribution center.

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit from each distribution center to each store.

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand of each retail store in units.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Supply capacity of each distribution center in units.

vars.name: open
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether a distribution center is open.

vars.name: ship
vars.description: Amount of product shipped from a distribution center to a store.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(open[c] * opening_cost[c] for c in CENTERS) + sum(ship[c][s] * transport_cost[c][s] for c in CENTERS for s in STORES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of opening distribution centers and transporting goods to stores.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_1
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 1 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_2
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 2 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_3
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 3 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_4
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 4 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_5
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 5 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_6
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 6 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_7
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 7 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_Store_8
constraints.description: Ensure demand of Store 8 is met.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_Center_1
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from Center 1 do not exceed its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_Center_2
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from Center 2 do not exceed its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_Center_3
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from Center 3 do not exceed its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_Center_4
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from Center 4 do not exceed its capacity if open.
